formulas.name: VLOOKUP
formulas.description: The VLOOKUP function searches for a value in the leftmost column of a table, and returns a value in the same row from another column in the table.

inputs.name: lookup_value
inputs.description: Enter the value to look up

inputs.name: table_array
inputs.description: Select the table/range to look up in

inputs.name: col_index_num
inputs.description: Select the column to return the value from

inputs.name: range_lookup
inputs.description: TRUE for approximate match, FALSE for exact match

inputs.name: numbers
inputs.description: Enter the numbers to sum, separated by commas

formulas.name: CONCATENATE
formulas.description: The CONCATENATE function joins several text strings into one text string.

inputs.name: texts
inputs.description: Enter the text strings to join, separated by commas
